15  //mode = 1;
16 
21  if(mode != 2)
22  {
23  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Basic Mode Selected!");
24  std::shared_ptr<TopicHandler> gc(new TopicHandler(nh,mode));
25  threads.push_back(std::thread(&TopicHandler::seperatethread,gc));
26  }
27  if(mode == 2)
28  {
29  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Advanced Mode Selected!");

31  threads.push_back(std::thread(&TopicHandler::seperatethread,gc));

33 
34  ros::spin();
38  ros::shutdown();
